resources.string: You must enable biometric security in your device settings.\n\nIf you already have biometry enabled, you may need to enable a different biometric option to meet the security threshold of the Vault App.
Your device does not support biometric security at the level required for the Vault App.
Unable to open biometry settings. Please open device settings.
Too many failed attempts, please try again later.
Biometry is required to access your Bip39 Phrases
Unable to show biometry to gain access to the app.\n\nPlease authenticate device from lock screen.
Complete biometry to access BIP 39 Phrase
Biometry invalidated. Keys no longer accessible.
Vault sends push notifications for important updates on your policy.\n\nUpdates can be time-sensitive and push notifications help to keep you informed.
No network available, please check your WiFi or Data connection
Something went wrong when attempting to register device, please try again
Please start adding guardians to invite to your policy
Share these links with your guardians to continue setting up your policy
The invitation link used for guardianship is missing policy data.\n\nPlease request a new link from the policy owner and try again.
Successful biometry authentication is required to use this app
You have been invited to Vault as a guardian,\ndo you accept guardianship?
You have declined guardianship, to restart this process have the owner of the policy send you a new invite
Guardian setup complete, no further action required at this time
Received shard from owner, encrypting shard and updating policy data...
